users.headline: SpaceX launches Crew-6 astronaut team
users.description: An international team of astronauts launched towards the International Space Station this morning in Space Xâ€™s Crew Dragon Endeavour capsule on top of a Falcon 9 rocket

users.headline: AI passed an advertising Turing test for the first time
users.description: AI-generated ads fooled marketing experts and outperformed typical US print ads on a test that measured creativity and potential to spur emotional responses

users.headline: chips to defeat conventional computers
users.description: An alternative form of computer chip called a memcomputer could offer benefits over existing machines, and now a proof-of-principle digital memcomputer
